name: CQ.Ext.state.Provider
doc:
Abstract base class for state provider implementations. This class provides methods
for encoding ...

methods.name: clear
methods.doc: Clears a value from the state

methods.name: decodeValue
methods.doc: Decodes a string previously encoded with encodeValue.

methods.name: encodeValue
methods.doc: Encodes a value including type information.  Decode with decodeValue.

methods.name: get
methods.doc: Returns the current value for a key

methods.name: set
methods.doc: Sets the value for a key

events.name: statechange
events.doc: Fires when a state change occurs.
